channel.title: Udacity on Be Humble
channel.description: Recent content in Udacity on Be Humble

item.title: How to Download Udacity Nanodegree Content
item.description: The step-by-step tutorial is based on Udacimak - A Udacity Nanodegree Downloader. It allows you to download all the video and text-related content from the courses that you are enrolled in. It is a CLI-based method. I will use ubuntu-18.04 LTS for demonstration. Note: Udacimak was inspired after Udacity announced in October 2018 that students who graduate will no longer have life-time access to the course content. Pre-requisites: Install node (from maybe from this link)
